testcase.name: returns correct averages when the root of the subtree is the same as the main tree
returns correct averages when the root of the subtree is in the middle of the main tree
returns correct averages when the root of the subtree is a leaf of the main tree
throws an error when trying to add a root that already exists
throws an error when trying to add a leaf when there is no root in the tree
throws an error when the root value is not an integer
throws an error when the leaf value is not an integer
throws an error when trying to add a child to the parent that already has one
throws an error when the node with provided id does not exist
